AacRule.Description: Exclude legacy mcshield from Protect SystemCore Files and Registry Settings
Allow smss.exe to create/delete in a rename operation
Protect SystemCore Files and Registry Settings
Exclude Legacy mfehidin From Protect SysCore Drivers and Protect MMS Service Data
Protect the launch of mfemms.exe and mfevtps.exe
Protect MFEProtect and MFEInstall resourced Processes
Allow OS Upgrades, Sysprep, Windows Update, and System Restore access to protected certificate stores, registry areas, and system files
Allow OS POQ utility access to registry areas, and files
Prevent Image File Execution Options from being renamed and then renamed back
Allow services.exe to modify reg of protected SYSCORE services

Certificate.Name: root
Certificate.Issuer: VeriSign Class 3 Public Primary Certification Authority - G5
Certificate.Subject: VeriSign Class 3 Public Primary Certification Authority - G5

Certificate.Name: ca
Certificate.Issuer: VeriSign Class 3 Public Primary Certification Authority - G5
Certificate.Subject: VeriSign Class 3 Code Signing 2010 CA

Certificate.Name: ca
Certificate.Issuer: VeriSign Class 3 Public Primary Certification Authority - G5
Certificate.Subject: Symantec Class 3 SHA256 Code Signing CA

AacRule.Description: Allow services.exe to modify reg of mfeaack as appropriate
Protect Shared cache Registry Settings and data files

Service.Description: Provides firewall services to McAfee products

MMSService.Name: mfefire
MMSService.Description: Provides firewall services to McAfee products

AacRule.Description: Exclude Legacy mfehidin From Protect FireCore driver
Allow services.exe to modify reg of mfefire as appropriate

AacSubRule.AacMatchObject:
HKCCS\SERVICES\MFEFIREK\ENUM\**
HKCCS\SERVICES\MFEFIRE\ENUM\**
HKCCS\SERVICES\MFEAVFK\ENUM\**
HKCCS\SERVICES\MFEFIREK\SECURITY\**
HKCCS\SERVICES\MFEFIRE\SECURITY\**
HKCCS\SERVICES\MFEAVFK\SECURITY\** ?
0x309

AacRule.Description: Exclude Legacy mfehidin From Protect NDIS driver
Allow services.exe to modify reg of mfenlfk as appropriate
Exclude Legacy mfehidin From Protect ELAM driver
Allow services.exe to modify reg of cfwids as appropriate
